data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Super Mario World is a platform game made by Nintendo for the Super NES system. It ____ the ____ Super Mario game. In ____ game, Mario ____ through ____ worlds ____ defeat ____ enemy Bowser. The ____ adds ____ things ____ weren't ____ the ____ Mario ____. Yoshi appears in this game for the first time.
data.partBlankContent: Super Mario World is a platform game made by Nintendo for the Super NES system. It i_ the fi___ Super Mario game. In t__ game, Mario tra____ through se___ worlds t_ defeat h__ enemy Bowser. The ga__ adds n__ things th__ weren't i_ the prev____ Mario ga___. Yoshi appears in this game for the first time.
data.answer: 《超级马里奥世界》是任天堂针对超级NES系统开发的一款平台游戏。这是第五款超级马里奥游戏。在游戏中，马里奥穿越七个世界去打败他的敌人Bowser。这款游戏添加了之前《马里奥》游戏所没有的新内容。Yoshi第一次出现在这个游戏中。
